titles.title: Prioritizing mental health to the same degree as physical health to address the epidemics of suicide and drug overdose in the United States.
Prioritizing mental health to the same degree as physical health to address the epidemics of suicide and drug overdose in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for parity between insurance coverage of mental health and physical health treatment and for the Department of Health and Human Service's 2024 National Strategy for Suicide Prevention.
